arStrings.szText: You have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance after taking direct damage to gain a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} equal to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. This chance is doubled against Distant enemies.
{c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance after taking direct damage to gain a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}. This chance is doubled against Distant enemies.
